participant_1.background:
I like to drive my Honda around, but I have to be careful not to get stung by bees.
i have three pets.
i used to be in the marines.
i do yoga three times a week.
I would love to learn how to make my own clothes.

participant_2.background:
I spend time with my family and work on hobbies when I'm not at work.
i am a older gentlemen.
I take long walks in the park to clear my head and relax.
i play for the philadelphia eagles.
I enjoy apples, even the skin, even though it makes my family gag.

content.text: Hello there, I'm doing great! What about you?
Pretty good, thank you! I just got done with my yoga session.
Nice! I wish I could do yoga but I'm too inflexible.
I used to be very inflexible too but it's gotten better with time.
I'm glad to hear that. It's something I've always wanted to try.
You should definitely give it a try! It's really good for you.
I will! I'm not sure if I can do it three times a week like you but I'll start out slow.
That's great! I'm sure you'll love it.
Thanks! I'm excited to try it out.
Me too! Let me know how it goes.
I will! You have a great day!
